remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合用作的一部分要进行动画处理根据一组关键帧的属性值。This collection is used as part of a to animate a property value along a set of key frames. ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreSingleKeyFrameObjectElements**oneOrMoreSingleKeyFrameObjectElements* 一个或多个声明使用对象元素语法的对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一项之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，必须调用将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一项。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 设置至下一项。 sets to the next item. 该枚举数传递到集合的末尾之后，将放后的最后一项在集合中，且调用返回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要设置到再次集合的第一项，可以调用跟。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除项目，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下一个调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，即使枚举数已经无效，将返回到，设置的项。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前从第一个关键帧处开始和在最后一个关键帧结束搜索集合。The collection is searched forward starting at the first key frame and ending at the last key frame. 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是说，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 此方法通过调用可确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
